titleStmt.title: A Letter to the Honourable Major Slingsby, Lieutenant-Governor of Portsmouth
titleStmt.author: Beaumont, John, d. 1701.
Beaumont, John, d. 1701. A speech by Lieutenant Coll. Beaumont to His Grace the Duke of Brewick.

notesStmt.note: Signed: John Beaumont, Thomas Paston, Simon Packe, Thomas Orme, William Cooke, John Port.
